lead_paragraph: Houston Dynamo will face D.C. United Wednesday,  a day after the L.A. Galaxy defeated M.L.S. rival FC Dallas in the inaugural tournament featuring four teams from Major League Soccer and four from Mexico.
snippet: Houston Dynamo will face D.C. United Wednesday,  a day after the L.A. Galaxy defeated M.L.S. rival FC Dallas in the inaugural tournament featuring four teams from Major League Soccer and four from Mexico.
